what: Data on Forest Attributes in Washington State
title: Forest Attributes in Washington State
text: U.S. Department Agriculture, Forest Service, Forest Inventory Analysis (FIA) Program provides sorts estimates forest attributes uses research, legislation, land management. FIA uses set criteria classify plot land “forested” “non-forested,” classification central data point many decision-making contexts. small subset plots Washington State sampled assessed “--ground” forested non-forested, FIA access remotely sensed data land state. forested R data package containing data frame, forested, can develop model easily-accessible remotely sensed data predict whether plot forested non-forested.

what: Forest Attributes in Washington State — forested
title: Forest Attributes in Washington State — forested
text: U.S. Department Agriculture, Forest Service, Forest Inventory Analysis (FIA) Program provides sorts estimates forest attributes uses research, legislation, land management. FIA uses set criteria classify plot land "forested" "non-forested," classification central data point many decision-making contexts. small subset plots Washington State sampled assessed "--ground" forested non-forested, FIA access remotely sensed data land state. Practitioners can develop model easily-accessible remotely sensed data predict whether plot forested non-forested.

title: Forest Attributes in Washington State — forested
Forest Attributes in Washington State — forested
text: data frame 7,107 rows 19 columns: forested Whether plot classified "forested" , factor levels "Yes" "". year Year plot classified "--ground" forested . remaining, remotely-sensed variables measured different times averaged multiple years. elevation Elevation, meters. eastness Transformed aspect degrees eastness (-100 100). northness Transformed aspect degrees northness (-100 100). roughness Degree irregularity plot. tree_no_tree LANDFIRE tree/non-tree lifeform mask, factor levels "Tree" "tree". dew_temp Mean annual dewpoint temperature (1991-2020), degrees Celcius. precip_annual Mean annual precipitation (1991-2020), mm × 100. temp_annual_mean Mean annual temperature (1991-2020), degrees Celcius. temp_annual_min Mean annual minimum temperature (1991-2020), degrees Celcius. temp_annual_max Mean annual maximum temperature (1991-2020), degrees Celcius. temp_january_min Mean minimum temperature January (1991-2020), degrees Celcius. vapor_min, vapor_max Minimum maximum annual vapor pressure deficit (1991-2020), Pa x 100. canopy_cover Analytical Tree Canopy Cover, percent. lon, lat longitude latitude center plot slight perturbation. land_type Land cover type European Space Agency (ESA) 2020 WorldCover global land cover product, factor levels "Tree", "Non-tree vegetation", "Barren".

title: Forest Attributes in Washington State — forested
text: information source data, see Table 1 : White, Grayson W.; Yamamoto, Josh K.; Elsyad, Dinan H.; Schmitt, Julian F.; Korsgaard, Niels H.; Hu, Jie Kate; Gaines III, George C.; Frescino Tracey S.; McConville, Kelly S. (2024). Small area estimation forest biomass via two-stage model continuous zero-inflated data. Forthcoming: arXiv 2402.03263 (ver. 2.0). data definitions: Wieczorek, Jerzy .; White, Grayson W.; Cody, Zachariah W.; Tan, Emily X.; Chistolini, Jacqueline O.; McConville, Kelly S.; Frescino, Tracey S.; Moisen, Gretchen G. (2024). Assessing small area estimates via artificial populations KBAABB: kNN-based approximation ABB. Forthcoming: arXiv 2306.15607 (ver. 2.0. Source data pre-preprocessed using FIESTA R Package (GPL-3): Frescino, Tracey S.; Moisen, Gretchen G.; Patterson, Paul L.; Toney, Chris; White, Grayson W. (2023). FIESTA: forest inventory estimation analysis R package. Ecography 2023: e06428 (ver. 1.0).

title: Forest Attributes in Washington State — forested
